DOC.brief_summary: Long term open label study safety durability Urgent-SQ tibial implant device refractory overactive bladder syndrome ( OAB ) .
DOC.brief_title: Urgent-SQ Treatment Overactive Bladder Syndrome : 9-yr Follow
DOC.detailed_description: This follow-up study study van der Pal et al . ( see reference ) . The Urgent-SQ ankle ( tibail ) implant use demand electical stimulation stimulate tibial nerve treatment overactive bladder syndrome ( OAB ) . The implant place via minimal invasive surgical procedure . The implant activate external pulse generator . This study van de Pal et al . conduct approval local Medical Ethical Committee one year systematic follow-up eight patient . Since , follow-up use device open-label . This study report long-term ( 9yrs ) safety durability Urgent-SQ implant eight patient . Parameters evaluate local pain discomford site implant , AE 's related implant use implant . Current use treatment effectivity treatment . van der Pal F , van Balken MR , Heesakkers JP , Debruyne FM , Bemelmans BL.Implant-Driven Tibial Nerve Stimulation Treatment Refractory Overactive Bladder Syndrome : 12-Month Follow-up . Neuromodulation . 2006 Apr ; 9 ( 2 ) :163-71. doi : 10.1111/j.1525-1403.2006.00056 .
DOC.criteria: Refractory overactive bladder syndrome UrgentSQ tibial nerve implant 20032004 Patient implant remove first year implantation .
